text: The best founders don't just build products; they build movements. Today, be the catalyst for change in your industry. 🚀
author: Alex Monroe

text: Your MVP isn't about perfection; it's about progress. Ship it, learn from it, iterate on it. That's the founder's way. 💪
author: Alex Monroe

text: Every setback is setup for a comeback. Keep pushing, keep building, keep believing. Success is a marathon, not a sprint. 🏃‍♂️
author: Alex Monroe
